about_the_game:
Embark on a journey into the heart of Tokyo’s criminal underbelly with the prologue version of Tokyo Mafia Simulator. This introductory chapter offers a glimpse into the game’s core mechanics and sets the stage for the full experience.

Introduction to Tokyo Mafia Simulator: Step into the shoes of an ambitious yakuza recruit in this action-packed simulation game. Your mission is to carve out a reputation in the bustling metropolis of Tokyo. Demonstrate your allegiance, prowess, and strategic acumen to ascend the ranks of the notorious yakuza organization.

Gameplay Freedom and Features: Tokyo Mafia Simulator Prologue grants you unparalleled autonomy to shape your destiny. Engage in a variety of illicit activities:

Extort local enterprises

Acquire properties

Undertake yakuza missions

Become a feared hitman

Defend your territory

Romance companions

Manage the fallout from yakuza operations

Launder illicit earnings

Influence officials through bribery

Explore Tokyo’s dynamic landscape, teeming with side quests, interactive environments, and hidden enigmas waiting to be uncovered.


Are You Prepared? The world of Tokyo Mafia Simulator Prologue beckons. Will you rise to infamy or fall to the wayside? Download the prologue now and begin forging your legacy.

name: Tokyo Mafia Simulator Prologue
short_description: Tokyo Mafia Simulator Prologue is an simulation action-adventure game where you experience the thrilling and dangerous life of a yakuza in Tokyo. You can extort, steal, hit, protect, date, and more, as you rise through the ranks of the underworld.
